### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR,
  specialty VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  gender VARCHAR,
  dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  reason VARCHAR,
  status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  date_created DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR,
  treatment VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  day_of_week VARCHAR,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE healthcare_providers SET specialty = 'Pediatrics' WHERE provider_id = 1;
